boost::reflect::mirror_interface::calculate_type

calculate_type< MemberPointer > Struct Template Reference

Implements the InterfaceDelegate meta-function to determine what type to create to mirror MemberPointer in boost::reflect::vtable used by boost::reflect::any_ptr. More...

Detailed Description

template<typename MemberPointer>
struct boost::reflect::mirror_interface::calculate_type< MemberPointer >

Implements the InterfaceDelegate meta-function to determine what type to create to mirror MemberPointer in boost::reflect::vtable used by boost::reflect::any_ptr.
